field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the mailbox retrieving.

field.label: Host
field.help: Hostname of the mail server where mailbox is located.

field.label: Username
field.help: Username to authenticate against remote mail server.

field.label: Password
field.help: Password to authenticate against remote mail server.

field.label: Destination Email
field.help: Set the mail address to deliver fetched mails to.

field.label: Destination Host
field.help: Set the mail server hostname or IP to deliver fetched mails to.

field.label: Use SSL
field.help: This will enable or disable usage of encrypted connections. For IMAP and POP3 it will switch the ports to 993 and 995.

field.label: Certificate Fingerprint
field.help: If the server is using a self-signed certificate, the only option fetching mails is to enter the certficiate fingerprint here.
